Schema:
type Query {
  portal_searchAccount: [portal_portal]
  portal_searchRequests: [portal_request]
}

type Mutation {
  portal_administer(postPortalInput: portal_administerCommandInput!): portal_ack
}

type portal_portal {
  companyId: String!
  products: [portal_product]!
  subscriptions: [portal_subscription]!
  users: [portal_user]!
  requests: [portal_request]!
  actionRequests: [portal_actionRequest]!
  userInvitations: [portal_userInvitation]!
  payments: [portal_payment]!
}

type portal_product {
  id: String!
  name: String!
  subscriptionIds: [String]
  roles: [portal_productRole]!
}

type portal_productRole {
  name: String!
  description: String!
  userCap: Int!
}

type portal_subscription {
  id: String!
  application: String!
  status: String!
  cancelAt: String!
  cancelAtPeriodEnd: Boolean!
  canceledAt: String!
  collectionMethod: String!
  created: String!
  createdByUserId: String!
  currentPeriodEnd: String!
  currentPeriodStart: String!
  daysUntilDueue: Int!
  description: String!
  discount: String!
  endedAt: String!
  currency: String!
  type: String!
  items: [portal_subscriptionItem]!
}

type portal_subscriptionItem {
  id: String!
  created: Int!
  metadata: [portal_metadata]!
  price: JSON!
  quantity: Int!
  subscription: String!
}

type portal_metadata {
  name: String
  type: String
  value: String
}

scalar JSON

type portal_user {
  id: String!
  firstName: String!
  lastName: String!
  email: String!
  status: String!
  roles: [portal_role]!
}

type portal_role {
  productId: String!
  roles: [String]!
}

type portal_request {
  id: String!
  type: String!
  title: String!
  imageUrl: String!
  timestamp: String!
  cost: String!
  recurring: String!
  note: String!
  userId: String!
  statusId: String!
  statusTitle: String!
  typeId: String!
  typeTitle: String!
  productId: String!
  actions: [portal_requestAction]!
}

type portal_requestAction {
  key: String!
  description: String!
  reasonNeeded: Boolean!
}

type portal_actionRequest {
  requestId: String
  action: String!
  reason: String
}

type portal_userInvitation {
  email: String!
  phone: String!
  access: [portal_role]!
}

type portal_payment {
  id: String!
  amount: Int!
  timestamp: String!
}

type portal_ack {
  success: Boolean
  messages: [String]
}

input portal_administerCommandInput {
  addUser: [portal_userInput]
  userActions: [portal_userActionCommandInput]
}

input portal_userInput {
  id: String!
  firstName: String!
  lastName: String!
  email: String!
  status: String!
  roles: [portal_roleInput]!
}

input portal_roleInput {
  productId: String!
  roles: [String]!
}

input portal_userActionCommandInput {
  userId: String
  actions: [String]
}
